name: Fettuccine Alfredo with Chicken
author: Philadelphia
summary: Creamy sauce, succulent chicken, perfectly al dente pasta, a sprinkle of fresh herbs . . . all that's missing is the waiter and the check.
ingredients: 1 pound boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into strips
1 ¼ cups fat-free, reduced-sodium chicken broth
3 tablespoons KRAFT Grated Parmesan Cheese, divided
directions: Cook pasta as directed on package
Meanwhile, heat large nonstick skillet sprayed with cooking spray on medium-high heat
or until chicken is done, stirring occasionally
Mix broth and flour in same skillet
Parmesan, garlic powder and pepper; cook 2 min
or until mixture boils and thickens, stirring constantly with whisk
Drain pasta; place in large bowl
Add chicken mixture; toss to coat
